description: The Jint sandbox constraints must be applied to the core Jint wrapper service.
mitigation_plan: Tasks are assigned to the same developer in the same sprint.
impact_if_delayed: Delays the completion of the core secure engine.

description: The frontend script management UI requires the backend CRUD API endpoints to be available.
mitigation_plan: Define and agree upon the API contract on day 1 of Sprint 2. Frontend will develop against a mocked API until the real one is available.
impact_if_delayed: A delay in the API will directly delay the entire UI implementation.

description: The frontend preview integration depends on the backend preview API.
mitigation_plan: Tasks are planned for the same sprint with clear API contract definition.
